tutorials.title: How can I setup alerts for occurrences of critical event signatures in custom application logs using Logging Analytics?
tutorials.description: This lab explains how to create problem labels, EFDs, and new-fields using eval/extract for a custom log.

tutorials.title: Related Sprint: How to create a user defined Source?
Related Sprint: How to upload Files into a Source from the OCI console?
tutorials.description: Explains how to upload logs file using OCI console.

tutorials.title: Related Sprint: How to create scheduled search detection rules?
tutorials.description: This sprint explains how to create scheduled search detection rules.

tutorials.title: Related Sprint: How to create alerts on logs with Logging Analytics?
tutorials.description: Explains how to create OCI Alarms and verify it.
